name: I have started tracking my sleep habits using the excellent AutoSleep app – http://autosleep.tantsissa.com/ – Highly recommended. I charge my Apple Watch when I wake up while I am getting ready.

summary: @cleverdevil I agree. I bought that day 1 with my Series 4 and have been very happy with it. I either pop my watch on the charger while I have my first coffee and check the news or after dinner while doing same. Even when I don’t get it charged to 100% it has plenty to go more than 24 hours.

summary: @ronguest charging is really the only pain point. On days where I have to go into my office, I usually am in a bit of a rush to get out the door, so I don’t get much charge while I am getting ready. In those cases, I toss the Apple Watch onto a charger in my car, and then I’m usually good enough. I wish there was a faster charging solution for the Watch.
